title: Warranty documents and service agreements
dataVerified: Customer name, product serial number, purchase date, warranty period, retailer/manufacturer name, warranty terms
dataVisibleAfterVerification: Shows the issuer domain and the responder text (e.g., "Valid ID" or "Denied").
rationale: Consumer-facing document. Human-readable terms important. Prevents tampering with warranty dates and coverage. Customers don't need to keep paper warranty cards. Service centers verify coverage instantly. Domain binding to manufacturer prevents fake warranty documents.
